content:
See this PR:

https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core/pull/94

The PR build failed because of the state of the repo at the time that the change was made. Is there any easy pathway to somehow rebase that PR against the latest repo so we can see if it now passes (now that repo is finally passing it's tests)
Using github no (unfortunately), but using a git client you can merge latest master into that branch
